title: Shadow Assassin Dojo Adventure #58
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Shadow Training Hall
rooms.description: A dimly lit training hall with wooden floors worn smooth by countless footsteps. Training dummies line the walls, and weapon racks hold practice swords and staffs. Moonlight filters through paper screens, casting long shadows. The air smells of incense and sweat.

items.name: wooden weapon rack
items.description: A rack holding various training weapons - wooden swords, staffs, and practice kunai

items.name: scroll of the shadow path
items.description: An ancient scroll describing the dojo's founding
items.text: The Shadow Assassin Dojo was founded by Master Kage in the year 1582. He taught that mastery requires balance of mind, body, and spirit. Remember: there are 8 fundamental forms, 5 elements of combat, and 3 principles of stealth.

items.name: wooden training dummy
items.description: A well-worn practice dummy with strike marks covering its surface

items.name: meditation mat
items.description: A simple mat placed before a small shrine

items.name: bronze key with dragon symbol
items.description: A small bronze key engraved with a coiling dragon

items.name: training equipment cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with three compartments for storing training gear

items.name: Master Kage's teachings
items.description: A document outlining the fundamental principles of the dojo
items.text: Master Kage's Core Teachings: Master the 8 fundamental forms. Understand the 5 elements: Earth, Water, Fire, Wind, and Void. Follow the 3 principles of stealth: Silence, Shadow, and Speed. Only then can you enter the Inner Sanctum.

items.name: silver key with tiger symbol
items.description: A silver key engraved with a leaping tiger

items.name: reinforced sliding door
items.description: A heavy door leading to the armory, secured with a dragon-marked lock

rooms.name: Secret Armory
rooms.description: A hidden chamber filled with authentic weapons and armor. Katanas, shuriken, and kusarigama hang on the walls. Display cases hold ancient artifacts. Scrolls detailing assassination techniques are carefully preserved in glass cases. A portrait of Master Kage watches over the room.

items.name: portrait of Master Kage
items.description: A painting of the dojo's founder in traditional garb
items.text: Master Kage (1542-1620) - Founder of the Shadow Assassin Dojo. Known for his mastery of the Silent Strike technique and his philosophy of honorable assassination.

items.name: first display case
items.description: A glass case containing historical weapons

items.name: scroll of techniques
items.description: A scroll listing the dojo's signature moves
items.text: Signature Techniques of the Shadow Dojo: The Silent Strike - Master Kage's legendary technique. The Phantom Step - taught by Master Yuki. The Dragon's Breath - perfected by Master Ryu. These masters guard the path to the Inner Sanctum.

items.name: second display case
items.description: A case holding ancient armor pieces

items.name: locked weapon chest
items.description: An ornate chest secured with a tiger-marked lock

items.name: Master's final scroll
items.description: A scroll containing Master Kage's final instructions
items.text: To my successor: You have proven yourself worthy. The Inner Sanctum awaits beyond the Gate of Shadows. To pass, you must answer three questions that prove your understanding of our way. Remember who perfected each technique, and know that true mastery lies in the void.

items.name: jade token of mastery
items.description: A circular jade token engraved with the dojo's symbol - proof of a master assassin

items.name: Gate of Shadows
items.description: A massive black door carved with intricate symbols. Three questions are etched into a stone tablet beside it.

password_questions.question: Who created the Silent Strike?
password_questions.hint: Check the technique scroll and the portrait

password_questions.question: Who taught the Phantom Step?
password_questions.hint: The scroll of techniques lists each master's specialty

password_questions.question: What is the fifth element?
password_questions.hint: Master Kage's teachings mention all five elements

rooms.name: Inner Sanctum of the Shadow Master
rooms.description: You have entered the legendary Inner Sanctum! The chamber is circular, with walls covered in ancient scrolls and weapons of legendary assassins. In the center, a raised platform holds the Shadow Master's throne. Behind it, a secret passage leads to freedom. Moonlight streams through a skylight, illuminating the jade token in your hand.

items.name: Shadow Master's throne
items.description: An ornate black throne carved from a single piece of obsidian

items.name: ancient wall scrolls
items.description: Scrolls containing the complete history and techniques of the Shadow Assassin Dojo
items.text: The complete teachings of the Shadow Assassin Dojo, passed down through generations. You have proven yourself worthy to learn these secrets.

items.name: weapons of legend
items.description: The actual weapons used by Master Kage and the founding assassins, preserved for eternity

items.name: hidden escape passage
items.description: A concealed passage leading out of the dojo, accessible only to those who hold the jade token

rooms.name: Mountain Path to Freedom
rooms.description: You emerge onto a moonlit mountain path overlooking the valley below. The Shadow Assassin Dojo stands behind you, its secrets now yours. The jade token glows softly in your hand - you are now a true master of the shadow arts.

items.name: valley overlook
items.description: A breathtaking view of the valley below, with villages dotting the landscape under the moonlight

rooms.win_message: You have completed the trials of the Shadow Assassin Dojo! By solving the ancient puzzles and proving your knowledge of the dojo's teachings, you have earned the jade token of mastery. You are now recognized as a true Shadow Assassin, worthy of Master Kage's legacy. The path to freedom lies open before you. You win!
